lines: 1. I would be dear Saviour, Wholly Thine; Teach me how, teach me how; I would do Thy will, O Lord, not mine; Help me, help me now.
Refrain : Wholly Thine, wholly Thine, Wholly Thine, this is my vow; Wholly Thine, wholly Thine, Wholly Thine, O Lord, just now.
2. What is worldly pleasure, Wealth, or fame, Without Thee, without Thee? I will leave them all for Thy dear name, This my wealth shall be.
3. As I cast earth's transient Joys behind, Come Thou near, Come Thou near; In Thy presence all in all I find,'Tis my comfort here.
